account.disclaimer_full: This information may not account for this account's total bio.
account.requested: Awaiting approval. Click to undo asking to follow
boost_modal.combo: You can hit {combo} to always skip this
bundle_column_error.title: Oops! Can't link.
bundle_modal_error.message: Oops! Could not load this unit.
column_back_button.label: Back
compose_form.hashtag_warning: This toot won't show up in any hashtag as it is no listing. Only public toots show up in inquiry by hashtag.
compose_form.lock_disclaimer: Your account is not {locked}. Anybody can follow you to look at your follows-only posts.
compose_form.sensitive.unmarked: Media is not marked as sensitive
confirmations.block.message: Do you you want to block {name}?
confirmations.delete.message: Do you you want to discard this status?
confirmations.delete_list.message: Do you want to discard this list?
confirmations.domain_block.message: Do you truly you want to block anybody and anything on {domain}? Usually a particular block or two will work.
embed.instructions: Link this status on your blog or portfolio by copying this:
embed.preview: this is how your post will look:
emoji_button.label: Add icon
empty_column.community: No local activity right now. Post publicly to start things rolling!
empty_column.hashtag: Nothing in this hashtag right now.
empty_column.home: No local activity right now! Visit {public} or try an inquiry to find accounts to chat with.
empty_column.list: Nothing in this list right now. If accounts in this list post, it will show up in this spot.
empty_column.notifications: No notifications right now. Talk to accounts to start a dialog.
empty_column.public: Nothing in this spot right now! Post a toot or follow accounts to fill it up.
getting_started.heading: Start
getting_started.open_source_notice: Mastodon is "FOSS". You can add contributions or flag bugs on GitHub at {github}.
keyboard_shortcuts.column: to focus a status in a columns
keyboard_shortcuts.down: to go down in you list
keyboard_shortcuts.heading: Shortcuts
keyboard_shortcuts.up: to go up in your list
loading_indicator.label: Loading...
missing_indicator.label: Not found
mute_modal.hide_notifications: Don't show notifications from this account?
notifications.clear_confirmation: Do you want to discard all your notifications?
onboarding.page_five.public_timelines: Our local activity shows public posts from anybody on {domain}. Global activity shows public posts from anybody who folks on {domain} follow. You can find folks to follow and chat with.
onboarding.page_four.home: This local activity shows posts from folks you follow.
onboarding.page_four.notifications: This notifications column shows if anybody chats with you.
onboarding.page_one.federation: Mastodon is a multiplicity of various instantiations joining up into a social hub. Our word for a host in this hub is "instantiation."
onboarding.page_one.handle_hint: This is to assist folks in finding you
onboarding.page_six.apps_available: You can try out {apps} for iOS, Android and various platforms.
onboarding.page_six.github: Mastodon is "FOSS". You can flag bugs, ask for additional functionality, or start working on {github}.
onboarding.page_three.profile: Modify your bio to pick your avatar, bio, and display alias. You will also find additional controls.
onboarding.page_three.search: Try our inquiry bar to find accounts and look at hashtags, such as {illustration} and {introductions}. To look for an account who is not on this instantiation, try typing that acocunt's full alias.
onboarding.page_two.compose: Think up posts in our draft column. You can upload photos, control your post privacy, and add tricky topic warnings with our following icons.
privacy.direct.long: Post to accounts with tags only
privacy.private.long: Post to accounts following you only
privacy.unlisted.long: Do not post to public activitys
regeneration_indicator.label: Loading…
report.forward_hint: The account is from another server. Send an anonymized copy of the report there as well?
report.hint: The report will be sent to your instance moderators. You can provide an explanation of why you are reporting this account below:
search_popout.tips.full_text: Simple text returns statuses you have written, favourited, boosted, or have been mentioned in, as well as matching usernames, display names, and hashtags.
search_popout.tips.text: Basic inquiry finds matching accounts and hashtags
ui.beforeunload: Your draft is lost if you quit Mastodon.
upload_area.title: Drag & drop to upload
upload_button.label: Add photo
upload_progress.label: Uploading...
